articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: No Man’s Sky update 4.0, Waypoint, streamlines game for Switch launch
articles.description: Launching alongside the new Nintendo Switch version, the update to the space exploration game adds a new Relaxed mode, as well as customisation features, an inventory overhaul, an information portal and quality of life improvements. Waypoint launches Oct. 7
articles.content: Update 4.0, Waypoint, gives game a major balance and design overhaul

articles.title: Space adverts are now economically viable but potentially dangerous
articles.description: Falling launch costs for satellites mean space advertising may now make commercial sense, according to a feasibility study, but the idea remains controversial
articles.content:
By Alex Wilkins
Launching satellites into orbit is cheaper than ever
Jacques Dayan/Shutterstock

articles.title: De Netflix à Apple ou Amazon, une vague de nouveaux entrants dans la publicité

articles.author: Nadia Drake
articles.title: How these feuding map-makers shaped our fascination with Mars
articles.description: One was an artist who loved space. His rival was a bold professional astronomer. Their race to map the red planet sparked decades of science and speculation.
